name: Sourdough Bagels

attributes.title: Ingredients
attributes.details: Organic bread flour, malt, salt and young rye starter

attributes.title: Storage
attributes.details: Enjoy hot or toasted | Keep at room temperature for up to 2 days | For longer storage, place in zip-lock bags and keep in the freezer for up to 3 months | Bread should not be refrigerated | To serve from frozen, allow bread to thaw at room temp. and then refresh in 180c oven

attributes.title: Delivery
attributes.details: Sourdough bakery delivers Monday through Saturday of each week upon pre-order

description: New York style chewy bagels, fermented for 48 hours.
